title: (07520) Petra - Camí de Son Torrat

title: (07520) Petra - Unnamed Road
description: Buen sitio para aparcar y pernoctar, situado justo al lado de la ermita de Bonany. Hay mesas de picnic y un pozo de agua potable (cerrado ahora por COVID). Magníficas vistas

title: (07250) Vilafranca de Bonany - Unnamed Road
description: The Bonany Monastery car park offers a gravel parking space under trees for one to a maximum of two vans and many vacant straight asphalt parking spaces. It is very clean and there are some garbage cans. Here you are outside the monastery walls, which we much preferred to driving directly into a private area. There would also be parking spaces right next to a picnic area and the toilets. Especially since the monastery is inhabited and also offers rentals, it was not right for us to spend the night higher up directly under strange windows. The toilets are on the monastery grounds, 2-3 minutes from the lower parking lot.

title: (07680) Porto Cristo -
description: Parking Coves del Drac. Visit caves. Ample parking with shade. Picnic area. It closes at 6pm.

title: (07680) Porto Cristo - 6 Carrer del Gambí

title: (07680) Manacor - 3 Carretera del Moll
description: Parking only

description: Access parking to Cala Muerta. no prohibition signs. I think it is even possible to spend the night but it is very sloping. We just used this parking lot to go see the Cala.

title: (07680) Manacor - 29 Carrer de la Vela

description: Small parking lot next to a holiday home, nice view!

title: (07680) Manacor - 2 Plaça Torre

title: (07680) Manacor - 2 Carrer de les Salines

title: (07680) Porto Cristo - 1 Carrer Galeo
description: It is a street by the sea, with breeze and sea views, very very quiet, sleeping is great, it is not a car park as such but it sleeps without problems. It is a residential area with very little vehicle traffic. To sleep one or two nights great. The sea is oiled all night.

title: (07680) Manacor - 19 Carrer de la Punta Rasa
title_short: (07680) Manacor - 19 Carrer de la Punta Rasa

title: (07200) Felanitx - Km12,14 Carretera Porreres

name: Campament Hipocampo
title: (07689) Campament Hipocampo
description:
Campanento Hippocampo: Very nice oasis in middle of nothing.
It’s possible to park a van and refresh yourself with showers, pool and clean toilet. Just what we need for another part of our “wild camping” trip in Mallorca. Peoples here are very nice. Can be crowded but with tents Od peoples in rented rooms, but nights are calm.

title: (07200) Felanitx - 2 Carrer de Santueri
description: Launderette. Laundry is really dry at the highest setting.

title: (07200) Felanitx - PMV-4011
description: Small parking lot on the road to the San Salvador Monastery. Relatively flat. Great view, quiet. Road up winding, not too steep, asphalt in very good condition. Please keep it clean! Sleeps 3-4 at night.

title: (07689) Cales de Mallorca - 215 Carrer Cala Antena

title: (07200) Felanitx - 1 Carrer de Sant Nicolau
description: The cheapest gas station in the area

title: (07200) Felanitx - 16 Carrer Quetgle

title: (07550) Son Servera - 76 Carrer del Doctor Servera
title_short: (07550) Son Servera - 76 Carrer del Doctor Servera

title_short: (07688) Cales de Mallorca - 145 Carrer de Cala Domingos

title: (07570) Artà -
description: Parking in the city of Arta, at the foot of the sanctuary. Many places, we spent the night at the end of the parking with a view of the sanctuary, ready for the city tour the next day. Numerous passage of the police in the evening that we never said anything. We even unpacked table and chairs to eat at night, while storing absolutely everything for the night. We are in the middle of October, so out of season. Market in the city on Tuesday. The place is certainly not sublime, but it allows you to sleep safely to visit the city.

title: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 2 Carrer Roselles
title_short: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 2 Carrer Roselles
description: Es gibt viele kleine Straßen direkt in Strandnähe, auf denen man kostenfrei parken kann. Wir haben hier eine Nacht direkt am Strand verbracht und sind morgens mit Meerblick aufgewacht. Direkt nebenan gibt es eine Beachbar und ein Café mit kleinen Supermarkt.

title: (07670) Felanitx - 17 Carrer de la Fotja
description: Small però next to Cala Brafi, does not have però services for a perfect night!

title: (07510) Sineu - 41A Carrer Nou

title: (07691) S'Alqueria Blanca -

title: (07559) Son Servera - 110 Carrer Sense Nom

title: (07589) Capdepera - 159 Via Costa i Llobera

title: (07691) Santanyí - 156 Diseminado Poligono 9

Access by 39.3904346, 3.1477667, abstain large AC's, narrow and curvy road. Please keep it clean.

title: (07579) Artà - 3 Diseminado Camping Club
description: In front of a former campsite, you stand quietly on a very little-used road; only now and then people who walk their dog or go for a walk.

title: (07650) Santanyí - 29 Carrer des Convent
description: Non-potable water to fill the tank free.

title: (07458) Can Picafort - 41 Carretera Artà-Alcúdia
description: Campervan wash with no height limit.

title: (07579) Artà - Unnamed Road

description:
Water available very slowly but there is!
restrooms and convenience stores.

It's a 24 hour gas station parking lot. There's not much light or much movement and that's great. There are toilets inside the gas station, which is not if it can be done at night.

title: (07589) Capdepera - 109 Via de les Cales

In the surrounding streets or in the entire area of Cala d'Or there are multiple options where to park and spend the night.

title: (07660) Santanyí - 38 Avinguda dels Benvinguts
description: A free water point from a Cepsa gas station. The water comes out with very little flow, in fact it is the faucet with the least flow that I have seen, but there is nothing else in the area.

title: (07669) Felanitx - 2 Carrer s'Hortet
description: Marked parking for 6. Ideal for campervans, motorhome possible out of season. Beach immediately in front of parking. Going to be busy in season but very quiet winter and spring.

title: (07518) Lloret de Vistalegre - p343 Camí des Cementírí
title_short: (07518) Lloret de Vistalegre - p343 Camí des Cementírí
description: Municipal sports center parking area with services, old camping area (Covid eye) possibility of excursions in the communal municipality forest (on foot, or by bike)

title: (07660) Cala D'or - 5 Calle sin Nombre 272
description: Perfect place to visit Cala d'Or. suitable for larger motorhomes. 7m with the back over the sidewalk

title: (07660) Santanyí - 29 Carrer des Comellars
description: Very large parking without problems away from beach areas a little traffic at night very quiet

title: (07660) Santanyí - 39 Avinguda de Calonge
description: Free parking super well located.. In the heart of the village, all at a step supermarket next bars etc. Beach a pleasant 5 min walk. Recommendable

title: (07579) Betlem - 134 Avinguda Llorer
description: We slept here after the police invited us to go to the park4nights near the sea. It is a fairly large field, next to a road that leads to an urbanization, quiet at night. From here, a path goes up to the Betlem viewpoint (50 ') with beautiful views (one of the photos is from the viewpoint).

title: (07660) Santanyí - 31 Avinguda de Calonge
description: Lavandería Punt D'aigua Express - Laundromat with multiple washers and dryers. Must be paid with coins! Detergent is already present and smells good.  My laundry (bedding, clothes, etc.) was dry in 20 minutes. There are parking spaces either directly on the street or behind the building. Driveway also suitable for larger mobile homes. Wasn't sure if the coin changer worked because there was a note on it. That's why I changed money in the supermarket beforehand.

title: (07660) Cala D'or - 1D Carrer Marquès de Comillas
title_short: (07660) Cala D'or - 1D Carrer Marquès de Comillas
description: Free public toilets and beach showers

title: (07458) Can Picafort - 99 Carrer Mar
description: BP gas station with free water service. Little flow, patience!

title: (07660) Santanyí - 14 Carrer de s'Estel
description: This is a street that is a p .. a marvel, central street chiringuitos, restaurants, playgrounds with attractions, shows .... And strategic enough that as it is a street if no one goes out. In the shade ... And next to some hedges that at night put the automatic irrigation and the truth that refreshes jjjjjj. This site is not suitable for motorhomes as such, I say it for the width that although they fit well ... It seems too much for this site. We move in a ducato camper of 6 meters plus a ball carrier of 0.8m. But the length is not the problem, we go with Ducato standard width. Okay?

title: (07458) Can Picafort - 92 Carretera Artà-Alcúdia
description: In contrast to the vast majority of Repsol gas stations on the island, there are not only butane gas bottles here, but also propane gas bottles (as of 11/22).

title: (07660) Santanyí - 22 Carrer Mallorca
description: It is a change of address or roundabout with practicable parking on its banks, people use it to park and go fishing and things like that. Good place to sleep, very very quiet ideal if you come by motorhome and something big since you can't find a place in town. We slept here for two very hot days and I guarantee that with the little breeze from the sea we slept fabulously. We only changed on the third day to the other place that I put here very close due to the proximity to a beach and cove to which it is impossible to park as the sheets stick to you in this place. The other site you commented on is not for motorhomes. Okay? We go with a Ducato.

title: (07691) Santanyí - 740 Diseminado Poligono 7
description: Small parking area between two streets, little traffic.

title: (07660) Santanyí - 26 Carrer Menorca
description: Parking right by the sea, no service. Since few tourists on the island, very quiet area. Good for one night.

title: (07440) Muro - 999F Carrer Poliesportiu
description: Sports car park in the municipality of Muro. It is in a quiet place. It can be placed at the bottom of the car park for added peace of mind. It has a charging point for electric vehicles. Perfect to spend a quiet night and take the opportunity to visit Muro. Parking is quite large.

title: (07589) Capdepera - 124 Calle a D-d
description: Quite place in the evening, next to beautiful bay with nice beach.

title: (07579) Betlem - 10T Polígon Ferrutx
description: After a climb of about a hundred meters on a sloping track, a nice flat place with a magnificent view.

title: (07630) Campos - 2 Carrer de Manacor
description: Laundromat. Easy parking in the surrounding streets. There are 6 industrial washing machines and 6 dryers of different sizes. The wash lasts 30 min. It has a currency exchange office. At the entrance to Campos.

title: (07660) Cala D'or - 13 Carrer d'es Galió
description: Public parking in very quiet tennis school, small pine forest

title: (07630) Campos - 95 Carrer de Fra Joan Ballester Carmelita
title_short: (07630) Campos - 95 Carrer de Fra Joan Ballester Carmelita

title: (07579) Betlem - 72 Polígon Artà
description: Parking at the end of a dead-end street. We spent one night here after checking that it was not possible to park in the rest of 4nights in front of the sea. Quiet and flat place, without services.

title: (07630) Campos - 21 Carrer de Sant Blai
description: I filled up here and asked for fresh water for the mobile home when paying. The friendly employee showed me that there is a water tap with a hose on the outer left edge of the gas station (directly to the left of the exit). It is also possible to connect your own hose to the Gardena coupling. Thanks for this service!

title: (07660) Cala D'or - 3 Carrer de Voltor
description: Ample parking, with playground and public park to rest.

title: (07660) Santanyí - 61 Avinguda d'es Fortí
description: Large parking at Es Forti. Slightly inclined ground. The top sites are quite flat. Of course, there is public traffic during the day. Not far from the tourist center. No disposal and water supply services, etc. Also suitable for slightly larger campers.

title: (07691) Santanyí - 1 Carretera Porto Petro Alqueria
description:
Just set off the bend of Porto Petro a flat (ish) area for 2 motorhomes

just far enough away from the road to not have much noise but still close enough for the great view

PLEASE NOTE THIS IS A NATURAL RIVER BED. DO NOT PARK HERE IN A HEAVY STORM

title: (07589) Capdepera - 48 Carretera Coves de s'Ermita
description: Parking in the Arta cave with magnificent view. We spent a lovely evening and a restful night there.

title: (07458) Can Picafort - 13 Carrer Josep Maria Llompart
title_short: (07458) Can Picafort - 13 Carrer Josep Maria Llompart
description:
Large municipal library parking lot.
 There is also ample parking for large motorhomes.

title: (07630) Campos - 28 Carrer d'Eivissa
description: Wide street, no exit no traffic. No noise. With streetlights. Asphalted and leveled

title: (07458) Can Picafort - 2 C-5

description: Small port of Porto Petro. some places without free ban. very accessible out of season.

title: (07630) Campos - Camí Cementerio
description: Parking at the cemetery, very quiet and secluded. Stayed there for one night with no problems.

title: (07579) Artà - Carretera Camide Cala Mitjana
description: Parking of a viewpoint on the access road to Cala Torta and Cala Mitjana. Quiet place, and although it is next to the road, very few cars pass during night. Surrounded by pine forests and incredible views. Access suitable for large ACs too. Pretty flat.

title: (07691) Santanyí - 39 Carrer Donants de Sang
description: It's a nice quiet parking place, also there are lots of parking places in this vicinity, there is a market and shopping mall nearby.

title: (07580) Capdepera - 10 Carrer de sa Tafona Nova
title_short: (07580) Capdepera - 10 Carrer de sa Tafona Nova
description: Partially shaded parking, suitable for CC over 7m. Playground for children nearby. Night possible, no prohibition. Very quiet and close to the city center and the castle.

title: (07144) Costitx - 9 CamÍ de Son Bernat
description: Parking of the astronomical observatory. quiet despite regular flights from 5h to 23h. visit of the observatory possible Friday and Saturday evening at 20h. reservation 34649997752.

title: (07589) Provensals - 24 Carrer s'Arbossar
description: Very pleasant, calm and shady place. Near the sea.

title: (07691) Santanyí - 2 Carretera A.Blanca-C. Mondragó
description: Parking with lots of shade and very spacious. Free at night and for the day 5 euros. 5 minutes from the beach. In the heart of the Mondragó Park. It has toilets.

title: (07300) Inca - 106 Diseminado Poligono 6
description: Below the Ermita there is a large gravel / meadow area that is designated as a parking lot. There is a small playground at the Ermita and you have a beautiful view of Llubí. The environment is calm and we stood here all alone in December.

title: (07580) Capdepera - 18 Carrer de sa Lluna
description: Free cement parking with fairly large spaces for vans.

title: (07589) Provensals - 189 Carrer Vell Marí
description: It really is not a parking lot, but the cars park there to go fishing or to swim in the large area of rocks that there is. The rocks are at the height of the water so that access to water is easy.

title: (07691) Santanyí - 7 Avinguda de la Torre

title: (07580) Capdepera - 16b Plaça de la Constitució
description: Free parking, perfect for visiting the city and the castle. There was room even in the middle of the afternoon. We didn't spend the night here but it seems possible. No amenities on the parking lot.

title: (07589) Provensals - Carretera de Sa Font de Sa Gala
title_short: (07589) Provensals - Carretera de Sa Font de Sa Gala
description: Beautiful seaside resort near Cala Ratjada and Capdepera. It is a car park that is of course heavily frequented in the high season. But we always found a place. Some hotels in the area, but also cafes and restaurants, also on the beach. Beach shower available, was enough for us. Good opportunities for hiking. No camping, please, and don't leave rubbish lying around!

address.street: Carretera de Sa Font de Sa Gala

title: (07691) - 18B Carrer de la Barca Trencada

title: (07210) Castellitx de la Pau - Unnamed Road

title: (07629) Algaida - Ma-5018

title: (07629) Algaida - Ma-5018
description: Parking of the sanctuary of Cura. In the monastery there are toilets, they can be closed at night. It has a restaurant and wonderful views of the entire island. The only drawback, the presence of mosquitoes, although in the parking lot in principle, there is less.

title: (07650) Santanyí - 5 Carrer de Campos
description: Automatic laundry. Schedule from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. LD. Automatic detergent machine, has change and can be paid with bills. Does not support card.

title: (07690) Santanyí - 28 Cap d'es Moro

title: (07458) Muro - Carrer Arenes

description: Parking in a pine forest lit at night, it's flat and there are bins, with plenty of space in winter.

description: A truly splendid spot by the sea! It is a small car park in a circle that can accommodate several vans / motorhomes.

title: (07579) Cala Mesquida -
description: Nice spot, small location slightly set back from the road very little used because in poor condition. The road goes around to the beach but is impassable a few hundred meters further with a van. Nice view, only one place relatively flat, in the middle of the vegetation.

title: (07690) Santanyí - 6 Carrer des Ferrallo M
description: Parking for up to 3 motorhomes right in front of the sea. Very calm. There is no service.

title: (07590) Cala Ratjada - 2 Via Mallorca
description: A&G Services Wax Salon Lavanderia. Attention there are only two possible washes and you cannot reduce the spin, always 1200! 40 or 60 degrees. Even the cold laundry came out very hot. The other wash cycles that can be selected are optically covered, but can be accidentally selected. Then the machine stops in the middle of the washing process. Small sink for washing hands or pre-washing laundry. WiFi available. Detergent available. GOOD TO KNOW: The dryer can be opened in the middle of the drying process - then the drying time can be increased in small steps. Otherwise you start again with a long sequence. staff friendly.

title: (07590) - 1010 Diseminado Galdi
description: We have found this place that is inside a pine forest, next to a path that leads to some houses. It is a quiet and hidden place to spend the night.
